trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewDeletedEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
Represents the method that handles the <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowDeleted" /> event of a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 表示处理 <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowDeleted" /> 控件的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> 事件的方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowDeleted> event when a Delete button (a button with its `CommandName` property set to "Delete") within the control is clicked, but after the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control deletes the record.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件都将引发<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowDeleted>事件的删除按钮时 (带按钮其`CommandName`属性设置为"Delete") 在控件内单击时，但之后<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件中删除记录。

trans-unit.source: This allows you to provide an event-handling method that performs a custom routine, such as checking the results of a delete operation, whenever this event occurs.
trans-unit.target: 这使您可以提供执行自定义的例程，例如检查删除操作的结果，每次此事件发生时的事件处理方法。

trans-unit.source: When you create a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewDeletedEventHandler> delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event.
trans-unit.target: 创建 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewDeletedEventHandler> 委托时，需要标识将处理该事件的方法。

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: 若要将事件与事件处理程序关联，请将该委托的一个实例添加到事件中。

trans-unit.source: The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate.
trans-unit.target: 除非移除了该委托，否则每当发生该事件时就会调用事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: For more information about event-handler delegates, see [NIB: Events and Delegates](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115).
trans-unit.target: 有关事件处理程序委托的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 事件和委托](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115)。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to programmatically add a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewDeletedEventHandler> delegate to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowDeleted> event of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何以编程方式添加<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewDeletedEventHandler>委托给<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowDeleted>事件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to declaratively add a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewDeletedEventHandler> delegate to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowDeleted> event of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何以声明方式添加<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewDeletedEventHandler>委托给<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowDeleted>事件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件。
